name: The Chromatic Shield
description:
The Nameless Evil invaded the planet of Tragr. But the people there were fierce and resisted.

So came an age of war, and slowly the Evil seemed to win.

There was a young man, the bravest one, born in war. He let himself be merged in a set of armor with magic.
They gave him the Chromatic Shield made from a meteorite, that was able to whitstand anything.

His soul purpose was to destroy The Nameless Evil. He sieged the Evil fortress with a battalion of warriors.
They fought brave, defeated any monstrosoties they met. They won the battle, but the earth opened and shallowed them all.
So the war was only stalled.

Years and years passed. Evil was creeping slowly back into the world. Nobody heard of the warrior since he went missing.
But hope also returns, in a form of a little spark, when an electric eel zapped the discharged armor lying next to an underground river.

I recommend to read any text that pops up during game (especially with the shields). :)

   CONTROLS:

Use keyboard or gamepad to play, use keyboard for sound and music options.

   KEYBOARD

WALK: Left arrow-Right arrow OR A-D

JUMP: Right Control OR Space

USE SHIELD (when have one): Right Shift OR B

POSITION SHIELD (when have one): Up arrow-Down arrow OR W-S

CHANGE SHIELD (when have two): Page down OR R

EXIT MENU: Escape

CHANGE SOUND VOLUME: F7-F8

CHANGE MUSIC VOLUME: F9-F10

   GAMEPAD

WALK: Left stick OR Right stick OR Dpad L-R

JUMP: A button

USE SHIELD (when have one): X button OR Left Trigger OR Right Trigger

POSITION SHIELD (when have one):  Left stick OR Right stick OR Dpad U-D

CHANGE SHIELD (when have two): Y button

EXIT MENU: Back OR Select
